channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-15637] LocalFs#listLocatedStatus does not filter out hidden .crc files
item.description: After HADOOP-7165, LocalFs#listLocatedStatus incorrectly returns the hidden .crc files used to store checksum information. This is because HADOOP-7165 implemented listLocatedStatus on FilterFs, so the default implementation is no longer used, and FilterFs directly calls the raw FS since listLocatedStatus is not defined in ChecksumFs.
item.summary: LocalFs#listLocatedStatus does not filter out hidden .crc files

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: jlowe, I see you committed HADOOP-7165, care to help with review?

+1 overall

Thanks xkrogen for reporting and fixing this! The v000 patch LGTM. Just one minor comment. This is probably being a bit too picky...it seems RemoteIterator interface does not prevent underlying implementation of next() from returning a null. In which case there will be a NPE on unfilteredNext.getPath(). Can we add this check?

Thanks for the review Chen! I'm a fan of defensive programming but I think in this case, the RemoteIterator#next() Javadoc states:

   * @return the next element in the iteration.
   * @throws NoSuchElementException iteration has no more elements.

implying that a NSEE should be thrown rather than a null. If an implementation returns null as a valid "element in the iteration", that's clearly an underlying bug and I think I would rather not ignore it (basically, failure promotion rather than masking). Let me know if you disagree.
Thanks xkrogen, for reporting and workin on this. I do agree with xkrogen, on this. +1 on the patch v0.
Thanks for the clarification xkrogen, makes sense to me, and thanks shashikant for the review. +1 on v000 patch. Will be committing it shortly.

I've committed the patch to trunk, branch-3.1, branch-3.0, branch-2.9 and branch-2.8. The patch did not apply to branch-2.8 directly, but since it was a simple import line position issue, I took the opportunity to just fix it in the committed patch. Thanks xkrogen for the contribution!

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #14670 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/14670/)
HADOOP-15637. LocalFs#listLocatedStatus does not filter out hidden .crc (cliang: rev e8f952ef06ae05d2b504300d6f19beb8a052b6f1)

  • (edit) hadoop-common-project/hadoop-common/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/fs/ChecksumFs.java
Thank you vagarychen! And thank you shashikant for the additional review!

And updated fixed version to 3.1.2 given this don't exist in branch-3.1.1.
leftnoteasy, leftnoteasy thanks for reporting this...Seems the API has changed, will revert the changes in these branches, and commit later again when patches for these branches are provided.

Reverted the commit in all branches except trunk. As it seems broken in all these branches. Will followup on this. Thanks again bibinchundatt leftnoteasy for the quick catch, and sorry for the inconvenience.
Sorry for the troubles all! And thank you for the quick revert, vagarychen. I attached a branch-3.0 patch (applies to branch-3.0, branch-3.1, branch-2, branch-2.9) and a branch-2.8 patch.
